attributes.action: Keep The Moto GP at Silverstone
attributes.additional_details:
As of 2014 The Moto GP will be the last at Silverstone before it moves to wales

But the 2015 round venue is unknown.I personally think it is nonsense because why not keep the venue the same for the following year

I would like the Government to debate the issue and Talk to Silverstone themselves to sort out something for 2015 or look elsewhere

Please Sign the petition if you want to keep the moto gp at Silverstone for 2015

Thank you and it must have 10,000 signatures for the government to consider this
